ns0:entry.ns0:title: SAP-samples/abap-platform-rap-workshops
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/SAP-samples/abap-platform-rap-workshops
Language: abap
This repository contains materials for workshops about the ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model (RAP).

ns0:entry.ns0:title: SAP-samples/abap-platform-rap110
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/SAP-samples/abap-platform-rap110
Language: abap
This repository contains the material for the hands-on session RAP110 - Building Fiori Apps with the ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model (RAP).

ns0:entry.ns0:title: SAP-samples/fiori-elements-opensap
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/SAP-samples/fiori-elements-opensap
Language: abap
This repository offers optional hands-on exercises for the free openSAP course "Developing and Extending SAP Fiori Elements Apps."

ns0:entry.ns0:title: SAP-samples/security-services-tools
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/SAP-samples/security-services-tools
Language: abap
If you use security-related services and tools such as EWA, SOS, System Recommendations, Configuration Validation, or a security dashboard in SAP Solution Manager, the ABAP reports in this repository can help with further analysis and development.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: SAP/abap-file-formats
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/SAP/abap-file-formats
Language: abap
File formats that define and specify the file representation for ABAP development objects
